title: Unifor, Automakers Form COVID-19 Task Force North of the Border
description: Unifor, the union representing Detroit Three autoworkers in Canada, joined those companies in announcing a joint task force Tuesday, the same day the province of Ontario declared an emergency amid the growing coronavirus pandemic. Like the U.S. task force ann…
